snippet.title: Five Dumbest Things on Wall Street: Aug 7
snippet.description:
Five Dumbest Things on Wall Street: Aug 7
By Gregg Greenberg 09:12 AM EDT 08/07/09
Accountants in an accounting mess; advice for Goldman; the value of Paula Abdul; Apple's Orwellian redux; and eBay's bad timing.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/10566803/1/five-dumbest-things-on-wall-street-aug-7.html
